title: Battle for the Truth: Join the Information warfare team that's fighting conspiracies and lies
description:
Phil Ehr fought in the cold war. Now he's formed America's first information civil defense force - and he wants you to join him in the fight against misinformation and disinformation.

Follow Frank’s Guest:
Phil Ehr
https://twitter.com/PhilEhr
https://twitter.com/GW_Initiative
https://georgewashingtoninitiative.org/


Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
